Mapbox API access token for mapbox-gl-js. Required when using Mapbox vector tiles/styles.

The tile zoom level of the map.

Specify the bearing of the viewport

## pitch

[src/components/MapGL.js:39-39](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/MapGL.js#L39-L39 "Source code on GitHub")

Specify the pitch of the viewport

## minZoom

[src/components/MapGL.js:42-42](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/MapGL.js#L42-L42 "Source code on GitHub")

The minimum zoom level of the map (0-22).

## maxZoom

[src/components/MapGL.js:45-45](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/MapGL.js#L45-L45 "Source code on GitHub")

The maximum zoom level of the map (0-22).

## hash

[src/components/MapGL.js:53-53](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/MapGL.js#L53-L53 "Source code on GitHub")

If `true`, the map's position (zoom, center latitude,
center longitude, bearing, and pitch) will be synced
with the hash fragment of the page's URL. For example,
<http://path/to/my/page.html#2.59/39.26/53.07/-24.1/60>.

## bearingSnap

[src/components/MapGL.js:62-62](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/MapGL.js#L62-L62 "Source code on GitHub")

The threshold, measured in degrees, that determines when
the map's bearing (rotation) will snap to north. For
example, with a  bearingSnap of 7, if the user rotates the
map within 7 degrees of north, the map will automatically
snap to exact north.

## pitchWithRotate

[src/components/MapGL.js:68-68](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/MapGL.js#L68-L68 "Source code on GitHub")

If `false`, the map's pitch (tilt) control with "drag to
rotate" interaction will be disabled.

## attributionControl

[src/components/MapGL.js:71-71](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/MapGL.js#L71-L71 "Source code on GitHub")

If `true`, an AttributionControl will be added to the map.

## failIfMajorPerformanceCaveat

[src/components/MapGL.js:81-81](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/MapGL.js#L81-L81 "Source code on GitHub")

If `true`, map creation will fail if the performance of Mapbox
GL JS would be dramatically worse than expected (i.e. a software
renderer would be used).

## preserveDrawingBuffer

[src/components/MapGL.js:84-84](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/MapGL.js#L84-L84 "Source code on GitHub")

Mapbox WebGL context creation option. Useful when you want to export the canvas as a PNG.

## refreshExpiredTiles

[src/components/MapGL.js:90-90](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/MapGL.js#L90-L90 "Source code on GitHub")

If `false`, the map won't attempt to re-request tiles once they
expire per their HTTP `cacheControl`/`expires` headers.

## maxBounds

[src/components/MapGL.js:93-93](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/MapGL.js#L93-L93 "Source code on GitHub")

If set, the map will be constrained to the given bounds.

## boxZoom

[src/components/MapGL.js:96-96](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/MapGL.js#L96-L96 "Source code on GitHub")

If `true`, the "box zoom" interaction is enabled

## dragRotate

[src/components/MapGL.js:99-99](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/MapGL.js#L99-L99 "Source code on GitHub")

If `true`, the "drag to rotate" interaction is enabled

## dragPan

[src/components/MapGL.js:102-102](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/MapGL.js#L102-L102 "Source code on GitHub")

If `true`, the "drag to pan" interaction is enabled

## keyboard

[src/components/MapGL.js:105-105](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/MapGL.js#L105-L105 "Source code on GitHub")

If `true`, keyboard shortcuts are enabled

## doubleClickZoom

[src/components/MapGL.js:108-108](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/MapGL.js#L108-L108 "Source code on GitHub")

If `true`, the "double click to zoom" interaction is enabled

## trackResize

[src/components/MapGL.js:111-111](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/MapGL.js#L111-L111 "Source code on GitHub")

If `true`, the map will automatically resize when the browser window resizes.

## maxTileCacheSize

[src/components/MapGL.js:118-118](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/MapGL.js#L118-L118 "Source code on GitHub")

The maxiumum number of tiles stored in the tile cache for a given
source. If omitted, the cache will be dynamically sized based on
the current viewport.

## renderWorldCopies

[src/components/MapGL.js:121-121](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/MapGL.js#L121-L121 "Source code on GitHub")

If  true, multiple copies of the world will be rendered, when zoomed out

## onViewportChange

[src/components/MapGL.js:128-128](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/MapGL.js#L128-L128 "Source code on GitHub")

`onViewportChange` callback is fired when the user interacted with the
map. The object passed to the callback contains viewport properties
such as `longitude`, `latitude`, `zoom` etc.

## onLoad

[src/components/MapGL.js:131-131](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/MapGL.js#L131-L131 "Source code on GitHub")

The onLoad callback for the map

Mapbox GL JS map instance

[src/components/Layer.js:15-15](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/Layer.js#L15-L15 "Source code on GitHub")

## layer

[src/components/Layer.js:18-18](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/Layer.js#L18-L18 "Source code on GitHub")

ImmutableJS Object representing Mapbox GL layer

## onClick

[src/components/Layer.js:29-29](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/Layer.js#L29-L29 "Source code on GitHub")

Called when the layer is clicked.

Type: [Function](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Statements/function)

**Parameters**

-   `event` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** The mouse event.
    -   `event.lngLat` **\[[Number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number), [Number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)]** The coordinates of the pointer
    -   `event.features` **[Array](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array)** The features under the pointer, using Mapbox's
        queryRenderedFeatures API:
        <https://www.mapbox.com/mapbox-gl-js/api/#Map#queryRenderedFeatures>

## onHover

[src/components/Layer.js:40-40](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/Layer.js#L40-L40 "Source code on GitHub")

Called when the layer is hovered over.

Type: [Function](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Statements/function)

**Parameters**

-   `event` **[Object](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object)** The mouse event.
    -   `event.lngLat` **\[[Number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number), [Number](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number)]** The coordinates of the pointer
    -   `event.features` **[Array](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array)** The features under the pointer, using Mapbox's
        queryRenderedFeatures API:
        <https://www.mapbox.com/mapbox-gl-js/api/#Map#queryRenderedFeatures>

        <https://www.mapbox.com/mapbox-gl-js/api/#Map#queryRenderedFeatures>

## radius

[src/components/Layer.js:65-65](https://github.com/urbica/react-map-gl/blob/d443230c0910aa560b053b65d74df329b0cd0c14/src/components/Layer.js#L65-L65 "Source code on GitHub")

Radius to detect features around a clicked/hovered point (defaults to 0)
